title: SOUL Reward Distribution
body:
Hello, people of the underworld,

The Hades Swap dev team has added three new pools to the yield section of the exchange.

This affects the reward distribution, with the goal to incentivize the Hades Swap user base to bring liquidity from top assets into our network, creating an interesting pair ecosystem for traders, users, and holders, prioritizing the pools that are key for Hades Swap & Olympus.

| Pool       | New % | Old % |
|------------|:--------------:|:--------------:|
| POLIS/DAI  |       25      |       40      |
| POLIS/SOUL |       16      |       25      |
| SOUL/DAI   |       16      |       25      |
| POLIS/BTC  |       12      |       0       |
| POLIS/ETH  |       12      |       0       |
| POLIS/CAKE |       12      |       0       |
| SOUL       |       7       |       10      |

Indicate whether you agree with the set percentages or not. In case the majority of the community disagrees, the team will create a channel on discord to discuss the allocation.
author: 0x82ed4a3CAA3A67F56FdbB225002E204D332457CF
